title: 29: Usury doesn't mean what you think it means. Probably.
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: We discuss the church's attitude toward lending, interest, and money. We also try to figure out definitions and how to survive the apocalypse.
itunes:author: Magbee, Hanenbee, Donaldbee
itunes:subtitle: I actually promise: it's more interesting than it sounds.
itunes:summary: We discuss the church's attitude toward lending, interest, and money. We also try to figure out definitions and how to survive the apocalypse.
